**Which document needs updating?**
(e.g., ALIGNMENT.md, 02_strategy/ROADMAP.md)

**Description of the change**
A clear and concise description of what needs to be changed and why.

**Strategic Alignment**
How does this change align with the core philosophy "Code is Law"?
